#include "commo.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../rcc/graph.h"
#include "../rcc/graph_marshaler.h"
#include "../command.h"
#include "../procedure.h"
#include "../command_marshaler.h"
#include "raft_rpc.h"
#include "macros.h"

namespace janus {

RaftCommo::RaftCommo(PollMgr* poll) : Communicator(poll) {
}

void RaftCommo::SendRequestVote(parid_t par_id,
                                siteid_t site_id,
                                uint64_t term,
                                uint64_t candID,
                                uint64_t lastLogIndex,
                                uint64_t lastLogTerm,
                                RaftServer* S) {

  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
  
    if (p.first == site_id) {


      Log_debug("%d sending request vote to %d", candID ,site_id);
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [S](Future* fu) {
        uint64_t retT;
        bool_t vote_granted;
        fu->get_reply() >> retT;
        fu->get_reply() >> vote_granted;
        S->HandleVotes(vote_granted, retT);
      };
      Call_Async(proxy, RequestVote, term, candID, lastLogIndex, lastLogTerm, fuattr);
      // Log_info("Req Vote RPC#:%d", rpc_count_);
    }
  }
}

void RaftCommo::SendAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,
                                  siteid_t site_id,
                                  uint64_t leaderTerm,
                                  uint64_t leaderID,
                                  uint64_t prevLogIndex,
                                  uint64_t prevLogTerm,
                                  vector<shared_ptr<Marshallable>> cmds,
                                  vector<uint64_t> logTerms,
                                  uint64_t leaderCmtIndex,
                                  uint64_t leaderLogSize,
                                  RaftServer *S ) {

  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      Log_debug("Commo: %d sending %d entries to %d",leaderID, cmds.size(),site_id);
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [S](Future* fu) {
        int64_t retT, folID;
        uint64_t prevIndex;
        bool_t success;
        fu->get_reply() >> retT;
        fu->get_reply() >> success;
        fu->get_reply() >> folID;
        fu->get_reply() >> prevIndex;
        S->HandleAppendEntry(retT,success,folID,prevIndex);
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      vector<MarshallDeputy> md_cmds;
      for(auto i:cmds ){
        MarshallDeputy md(i);
        md_cmds.push_back(md);  
      }      
      Call_Async(proxy, AppendEntries, leaderTerm, leaderID, prevLogIndex, prevLogTerm, md_cmds, logTerms, leaderCmtIndex, leaderLogSize, fuattr);
      // Log_info("AE RPC#:%d", rpc_count_);
    }
  }
}

void RaftCommo::SendHeartBeat(parid_t par_id, 
                              siteid_t site_id, 
                              uint64_t leaderID, 
                              uint64_t term,
                              uint64_t cmtIndex,
                              RaftServer* S) {
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  for (auto& p : proxies) {


    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [S](Future* fu) {
        uint64_t retT;
        fu->get_reply() >> retT;
        S->HandleHeartBeat(retT);      
      };      
      Call_Async(proxy, HeartBeat, leaderID, term, cmtIndex, fuattr);
      // Log_info("HeartBeat RPC#:%d", rpc_count_);
    }
  }
}


} // namespace janus
